name: Mind Hoard
relicLoreTooltips: Some use separate bins for organization. Others will place records into random piles and claim the system only “lives in their head.” Personally, I prefer drawers adorned with precise labels. The Wurmkin use stones with empty slots to keep their Echoes close and contained. What a wonder it is to learn of these civilizations that have developed without our hands to influence...or corrupt.

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.
